review: works great and easy to install

review: I see was led to believe the stick did more than what it does
author: Kameo

review: Easy to set up, user friendly. Great for the money. Even thinking about getting rid of cable. Only problem, it seems when it's used for an extended period of time, Netflix will freeze frame then speed up to catch up with the audio. Also wish Amazon had not removed the ability to side load apps.
author: jacob voorheis

review: get it for yourself and cut the cord, i wish miracast was not locked only to amazon products.
author: James B. Nthenge "Student for life"

review: Its the best! Very easy to use.

review: Works perfectly!!! It's way better than my chromecast!!

review: Great product. Super easy set up. Perfect for Netflix

review: Other than having the ability to access both linked accounts to all features- this works well

review: Nice streamer. Wish it had more processing power and the ability to connect headphones via Bluetooth or at least with wires to the remote controls for private listening.
